author: Nicholas Melillo
comment: Material design, custom colors and easy to use.

author: Vic Zhong
comment: Dev is very responsive and quick at solving issues. App does what it does simply, and well. Ads were unintrusive, and a dollar IAP was not a lot to ask for this level of support.

reply.author: TedSoft
reply.content:
Hello Vic, thanks for your updated review. Glad your problems were fixed.

Have a nice day,
TedSoft

author: Kevin Melone
comment: Nice quick thing to figure out the check
title: Nice calculator for being on the go

author: Joe DeRose
comment: This is by far the best interface I've found in a tip calculator for Android Wear. I would like for the default tip and split to appear on Android Wear as they do on the phone. And I wish there were a setting to disable the split entirely. (I understand that it's extremely valuable to some users, but every restaurant I go to offers separate checks, and I can't remember the last time I had to split a bill.)

reply.author: TedSoft
reply.content:
Hello Joe, I am sorry for the late reply. Things you requested were added in the latest update. If it fixed it, would you mind updating the review?

Have a nice day, 
TedSoft

title: Great Interface for Wear

author: Jonathan Chen
comment: After trying several tip calculators, I believe this is the easiest app to use for wear in terms of inputting numbers, although my default tip and split aren't staying synced.  Also, it would be nice if pressing "exit app" cleared the entry so it starts with a new entry on restart. Currently, when I reopen the app, it opens to the "split" page and still has my previous entry so I have to swipe backwards and delete the past entry every time.

reply.author: TedSoft
reply.content:
Hello Jonathan, I am sorry for the late response. Issues you mention were fixed in the latest update. If it fixed it, would you mind updating the review?

Have a nice day,
TedSoft

title: Some improvement - reset on exit

author: Tiago Lopes
comment: Shouldn't hafta deal with ads on a tip calculator. Equal button slow to press

reply.author: TedSoft
reply.content: Hello Tiago, I understand your concern about ads, however there is only one banner at the bottom, which shouldn't prevent you from using the app in any way. You can purchase the app for 1$ if you can't stand the ad banner. About the equal button, I have never encountered it being slow to press...you mean there is a delay before values appear?

title: Good calculator, monetized?

author: Kenny Martin
comment: Just hate those pop-up ads.I  Give it ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ if it did not have those ads.

reply.author: TedSoft
reply.content:
Hello Kenny, there aren't any pop-up ads, just a small banner at the bottom. It shouldn't prevent the app functionality in any way. Or you can purchase pro version for adfree, wear app and themes.

Have a nice day,
TedSoft
